name: ALT+RD
description:
PRONOUNCED / “ALTERED” change in character--

A GAME BY MELISSA, MACHI AND ZOE

Theory refusing to be upgraded results in them being pursued by the Enhanced for years. Eventually captured, Theory must escape captivity from the Enhanced Guards and other enemies within the Facility; platforming their way through various hostile floors and solving puzzles laid before them is the only way Theory will finally reach freedom.

WASD or arrow keys to move left and right

Space key to jump

Pre - alpha build so this is very much not finished yet 

Please give feedback on any bugs and general gameplay/ideas to add in further development :)

CURRENT KNOWN BUGS/PROBLEMS:

- capsules in place of  Theory (player character) and enemy character, character models and animations to be added asap

- lift panel turns green but doesn't always call lift straight away, continue pressing "E" if this happens

- jump height can vary (too big or too small) so please let us know what it looks like for you

- completed start and finish scenes with play and exit buttons to be added

- more audio to be added later but some background audio included
